00024 /*! \file CHPTilingFileReader.h This file provides methods to read a tiling CHP data file.
00025  */
00026 
00027 #include "calvin_files/data/src/CHPTilingData.h"
00028 #include "calvin_files/parsers/src/DataGroupReader.h"
00029 //
00030 #include <cstring>
00031 #include <fstream>
00032 #include <string>
00033 //
00034 
00035 namespace affymetrix_calvin_io
00036 {
00037 /*! This class reads a tiling CHP data file. It is an interpreter class.*/
00038 class CHPTilingFileReader
00039 {
00040 public:
00041         /*! Constructor */
00042         CHPTilingFileReader();
00043 
00044         /*! Destructor */
00045         ~CHPTilingFileReader();
00046 
00047 public:
00048         /*! Gets the name of the input file.
00049          *
00050          * @return The name of the file to read.
00051          */
00052         const std::string GetFilename() const { return fileName; }
00053 
00054         /*! Sets the name of the input file.
00055          *
00056          * @param name The name of the file to read.
00057          */
00058         void SetFilename(const std::string &name) { fileName = name; }
00059 
00060         /*! Reads the file header of the generic file and reads all the DataPlaneHeader information.
00061          *
00062          * @param data A reference to a GenericData object that will receive information from the file.
00063          * @exception affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::FileNotFoundException The file does not exist.
00064          * @exception affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::InvalidVersionException The file version does not match.
00065          * @exception affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::InvalidFileTypeException The file is not of the right type.
00066          */
00067         void Read(CHPTilingData& data);
00068 
00069 protected:
00070         /*! Name of the file to read */
00071         std::string fileName;
00072 
00073 };
00074 
00075 }
